channel.title: MARVELS
channel.description: Based on the graphic novel by Kurt Busiek and Alex Ross, Marvels takes place in the aftermath of the Fantastic Four’s battle with Galactus, high above New York City for the fate of the world. One intrepid photographer, an ambitious college student, and a cynical journalist embark on an investigation to confirm or debunk one of the most super-powered conspiracy theories of all time.
channel.itunes:summary: Based on the graphic novel by Kurt Busiek and Alex Ross, Marvels takes place in the aftermath of the Fantastic Four’s battle with Galactus, high above New York City for the fate of the world. One intrepid photographer, an ambitious college student, and a cynical journalist embark on an investigation to confirm or debunk one of the most super-powered conspiracy theories of all time.
channel.itunes:author: MARVELS

item.title: Marvel’s Wastelanders: Hawkeye Sneak Peek!
item.description: Marvel's Wastelanders: Hawkeye is the second installment in the Marvel's Wastelanders audio epic. Forty years ago, the villains of the world rose up and killed all the heroes. Well, all the heroes that mattered. The sole survivor of the Avengers, Hawkeye (Stephen Lang) is now a sideshow freak, re-living the worst day of his life for paying audiences. He's surly, broken, and losing his sight, but there's still that fire in him to be a hero, to avenge his friends. And he's ready to do what needs to be done: killing every last person responsible for the deaths of those he loved the most. Marvel's Wastelanders: Hawkeye is the second installment in the Marvel's Wastelanders audio epic. Written by J. Holtham (Supergirl, Jessica Jones), directed by Rachel Chavkin (Hadestown), with sound design by One Thousand Birds and an original score by James Harrison Monaco and Jerome Ellis. Learn more at marvel.com/wastelanders.
item.author: originals@stitcher.com (MARVELS)

item.title: Eyes Open
item.description: Reed Richards confronts his demons and tells the real story of the Galactus invasion while Marcia comes to grips with the truth of the narrative she’d been telling herself. Starring AnnaSophia Robb as Marcia Hardesty; Seth Barrish as Phil Sheldon; Method Man as Ben Urich; Ethan Peck as Reed Richards.
item.author: originals@stitcher.com (MARVELS)
item.content:encoded: Reed Richards confronts his demons and tells the real story of the Galactus invasion while Marcia comes to grips with the truth of the narrative she’d been telling herself. Starring AnnaSophia Robb as Marcia Hardesty; Seth Barrish as Phil Sheldon; Method Man as Ben Urich; Ethan Peck as Reed Richards.

item.title: The Herald
item.description:
The Silver Surfer leads Marcia, Phil, Ben, and Charlie on a chase across the city and shows them what it really takes to be the herald of Galactus.

Starring AnnaSophia Robb as Marcia Hardesty; Seth Barrish as Phil Sheldon; Method Man as Ben Urich; Ethan Peck as Reed Richards; Daniel Molina as The Silver Surfer.
item.author: originals@stitcher.com (MARVELS)

item.title: Limits
item.description: Marcia, Phil and Ben take a trip to the Bronx to meet Reed Richard’s young protegé, Charlie Martinez, to try and solve the mystery of how the leader of The Fantastic Four pulled off such a massive hoax.Starring AnnaSophia Robb as Marcia Hardesty; Seth Barrish as Phil Sheldon; Method Man as Ben Urich; Gabriela Ortega as Charlie Martinez; Daniel Molina as The Silver Surfer.
item.author: originals@stitcher.com (MARVELS)
item.content:encoded: Marcia, Phil and Ben take a trip to the Bronx to meet Reed Richard’s young protegé, Charlie Martinez, to try and solve the mystery of how the leader of The Fantastic Four pulled off such a massive hoax.Starring AnnaSophia Robb as Marcia Hardesty; Seth Barrish as Phil Sheldon; Method Man as Ben Urich; Gabriela Ortega as Charlie Martinez; Daniel Molina as The Silver Surfer.

item.title: Interference
item.description: The bonds of sibling loyalty are tested as Sue Storm-Richards (The Invisible Girl) and her brother Johnny Storm (The Human Torch) tell their versions of a story that may be a bit too fantastic to believe. Starring AnnaSophia Robb as Marcia Hardesty; Seth Barrish as Phil Sheldon; Method Man as Ben Urich; Louisa Krause as Susan Storm; Ehad Berisha as Johnny Storm.
item.author: originals@stitcher.com (MARVELS)

item.title: Warheads
item.description: Marcia revisits her own painful memories of the violent events that unfolded in her college campus the day Galactus invaded.Starring AnnaSophia Robb as Marcia Hardesty; Seth Barrish as Phil Sheldon; Method Man as Ben Urich.
item.author: originals@stitcher.com (MARVELS)

item.title: Monsters
item.description: Marcia, Phil and Ben catch up with Ben Grimm (The Thing) and get a first-hand account of the Fantastic Four’s clash with Galactus from a member of the super team. Starring AnnaSophia Robb as Marcia Hardesty; Seth Barrish as Phil Sheldon; Method Man as Ben Urich; Jake Hart as Ben Grimm; Juliet Brett as Alicia Masters.
item.author: originals@stitcher.com (MARVELS)

item.title: Truth & Consequences
item.description: As Marcia tries to piece together Phil and Ben’s experiences, J. Jonah Jameson challenges their account of what really happened the day Galactus fought The Fantastic Four. Starring AnnaSophia Robb as Marcia Hardesty; Seth Barrish as Phil Sheldon; Method Man as Ben Urich.
item.author: originals@stitcher.com (MARVELS)
item.content:encoded: As Marcia tries to piece together Phil and Ben’s experiences, J. Jonah Jameson challenges their account of what really happened the day Galactus fought The Fantastic Four. Starring AnnaSophia Robb as Marcia Hardesty; Seth Barrish as Phil Sheldon; Method Man as Ben Urich.

item.title: Retribution
item.description: Phil and Ben struggle through the chaos of the Galactus invasion and come to terms with what’s truly important to them in the face of complete annihilation. Starring AnnaSophia Robb as Marcia Hardesty; Seth Barrish as Phil Sheldon; Method Man as Ben Urich.
item.author: originals@stitcher.com (MARVELS)

item.title: Galactus Cometh
item.description: Phil Sheldon and Ben Urich gain front row seats to the greatest battle the world has ever witnessed: Galactus versus The Fantastic Four. Starring AnnaSophia Robb as Marcia Hardesty; Seth Barrish as Phil Sheldon; Method Man as Ben Urich; Ryan Andes as Galactus.
item.author: originals@stitcher.com (MARVELS)

item.title: COMING MARCH 19TH
item.description: Marcia Hardesty (AnnaSophia Robb) teams up with legendary photojournalist Phil Sheldon (Seth Barish) and his investigative partner Ben Urich (Method Man) to comb through the aftermath of Galactus' arrival in Manhattan and his fight with The Fantastic Four in this new retelling of the seminal graphic novel by Kurt Busiek and Alex Ross. Listen wherever you get your podcasts on Thursday, March 19th. For more information go to marvelspodcast.com.
item.author: originals@stitcher.com (MARVELS)
